Plot: As an executive is held captive by an employee, it's up to his wife to deliver the ransom.
Title: The Clearing
Writer: Pieter Jan Brugge (story), Justin Haythe (story), Justin Haythe (screenplay)
Actors: Robert Redford, Helen Mirren, Willem Dafoe, Alessandro Nivola
tomatoConsensus: Though it has an excellent cast, this emotionally detached movie is the kind that one admires more than enjoys.
